typelike.core.ListLike¶

class typelike.core.ListLike(data)[source]¶

Something that is ListLike is something that can be coerced into a 1-dimensional list. This includes lists, sets, tuples, numpy.ndarray, and pandas.Series.

Note: this class is not implemented. Don’t create an instance, because it doesn’t do anything.

classmethod register(subclass)[source]¶

Registers a new subclass as ListLike

Parameters

subclass (class) – Subclass to register as ListLike
